entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with GridItemsLayout: Items do not update from DataTemplate Bindings [Android] #22044
  • Control when splash screen ends #22043
  • Android : Border Stroke GradiantBrush can only switch to another gradiantbrush #22042
  • MaskedBehavior from the Toolkit Behaviors is not working properly #22041
  • Maui Android parent view inappropriately creates clipping mask when its opacity is less than 1, cropping out children #22038
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger #22036
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation #22035
  • iOS : Shell FlyoutItem Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons #22032
  • WCF service with DataContract and EnumValues not returning enum values in result #22031
  • This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback to reproduce the issue but has not had any activity for **4 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 3 days of this comment**. If it *is* closed, feel free to comment when you are able to provide the additional information and we will re-investigate. #22030
  • Bypass the certificate security check for localhost makes calls to valid https host throw exception #22029
  • Is there a bug with the picker control? #22028
  • ContentPresenter is not clearing its default Content binding when Content is TemplatedBinded in xaml #22027
  • (iOS) Entrys ignoring textColor-property if text-property set via binding #22025
  • XamlParseException is thrown changing the return type of a BindableProperty using the new modifier and setting it in Style #22024
  • MAUI WebView on iOS is suspended while app is still visible and functioning #22022
  • Error "The type 'NSObject' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0" #22021

Closed

  • ListView is not currently being Garbage Collected #20025
    Backlog
  • [Mac] Light up HideSoftInputOnTapped for Catalyst #21528
    .NET 8 SR4
  • ListView not visible in Android #22037
  • [WinUI] TemplatedItemsList and underlying ListView UI elements are disconnected, creates phantom views. #18401
  • iOS: Space appears between TitleView and Content when Entry is focused. #22026
  • Embeded youtube video doesn't work on iOS (MAUI Blazor Hybrid .NET7, .NET8) #20887
    Backlog
  • [Android] - Font icons and image issue on release #19607
  • Scrollview\CollectionView doesn't scroll #22005

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] use Java primitive `boolean` for `UriImageSource` #22040
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • `Microsoft.Maui-dev.sln` contains an invalid path #22033
    community ✨
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in ListView #22007
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • Add latest .NET9 and .NET8 #22034

Updated

  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Navigate Directly to Test #22019
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fixed creation of the CustomTabsActivityManager #22018
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
